notes_display: Phillips book, https://catalog.princeton.edu/catalog/664551, inserted between pp. 84 and 85
Bill torn in two pieces, taped together
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: TWENTY SHILLINGS | THIS Indented BILL shall pass current for Twenty Shillings in the Province of Pennsylvania; according to an Act of Assembly, of said Province, made in the 10th Year of the Reign of K. Geo. II. Dated Aug 1, 1746 | Twenty Shill. | C
issue_reverse_legend_s: To Counterfeit is DEATH. | Printed by B. Franklin
